title: Illuminated
description: Welcome to the kingdom of AlburniumIf the Wizard of Oz swept you away and Narnia enchanted you, then follow the White Road Chronicles for a new kind of adventure.Illuminated: Book One- begins with a girl in search of the truth.Alyra, mockingly known as Princess, was captured at an early age by the evil ruler, Darnel, and brought up in the dark land of Racah. Now, at the age of seventeen, she considers herself nothing special. She has no recollection of who she is or where she came from. Her hope of ever finding freedom dims.Until the messenger arrives. Until he brings to light the meaning behind the medallion she's kept hidden. Until she accepts the blinding truth.Now she flees for her life.Alyraâ€™s journey leads her down a narrow road with strange traveling companions. Together, they encounter a kingdom where nothing is what it first seems.This is an updated revised version with a new coverIlluminated is the first book of The White Road Chronicles followed by:Luminosity Book TwoEmanate Book ThreeRadiance Book FourIgnited Book FiveAblaze Book Six
author: Jackie  Castle
